tweet: b'We have had some incredible years inside of this place and it kills me to say goodbye but it\xe2\x80\x99s time. Take a look inside of the first home I purchased in my hometown of Boise Idaho. Listing courtesy of Piers Lamb - Boise Property Hunter / ReMax Capital\n\nhttps://t.co/dU3q2JpPyi'
b'@HtotheUNT @BryanCranston @Krystenritter This brings back such beautiful memories. I love you all. Well done you three!'
b'@JocelynTabing Press play!!'
b'@rianjohnson Bravo my friend! Can\xe2\x80\x99t wait!!!'

b'@kelsiesteiner29 Hey you! What a magical evening in Boise. Thank you so much for the love of Pinkman. He changed my life. You and your boy are amazing. Happy you were ok with me sharing this story with the world. You\xe2\x80\x99re a legend. Much love.'
b'@TomSchnauz Has anyone found them yet?? I was very sneaky when I was inside of you.'
b'@sharklodge @BreakingBad Damn. This is crazy. Beautiful work my friend. Truly.'

b'@bfasjj @BryanCranston Happy birthday my friend! That\xe2\x80\x99s the perfect way to celebrate a new year. Sending you and your girlfriend lots of love. Enjoy the rest of that beautiful bottle!!\xf0\x9f\xa5\x83'

b'@TheArtOfMakeup We had a wonderful time making Bojack. Couldn\xe2\x80\x99t be more proud. Fell in love with these characters just like everyone else did but sadly Netflix thought it was time to close the curtains and so here we are. They gave us a home for 6 beautiful years. Nothing we could do about it.'
b'@NickPappaG1980 You should explore that state. Incredibly magical. Not sure what you thought Idaho was but obviously you were sadly mistaken. https://t.co/n3cheetqg3'
b'@tonylaing291 @skeemzthagoon Yes. And scavenger hunt as well. Tickets will always be hidden in pairs.'
b'@wendyshayler My god I miss Almeria! Sending you and everyone there my love.'
b'@skeemzthagoon I was always planning on making this happen. Happy you wanted this as well. I believe you were at one of the events that I did at the Egyptian. Good luck with this one!'
b'@Constomy You can. Radio stations and scavenger hunt. Request the day off and hope for the best. \xf0\x9f\x91\x8d'
b'@RunFromDeath Not really. All is welcome. Impossible for me to travel all over the state to hide tickets in one day. I\xe2\x80\x99m not Santa. I can only do what I can do. You feel me?'
b'@RunFromDeath Mainly downtown Boise'
b'@SharonBialy @netflix @BreakingBad @mattjonesisdead @CharlesEbaker Love you girl!!'
b'@ChayanSk8 Yes. October 11th. Netflix.'

b'@poIyfawn Yeah no kidding my friend. I have literally been the only person on this planet to not talk about this damn thing and now here we are. Vince absolutely crushed this thing on the page and on film. Thrilled for the world to finally see this piece of cinema history. #Pinkman #Bitch'
b'@alyankovic @thelonelyisland @jackblack @bader_diedrich @janemarielynch @jonahray @EmoPhilips @SethGreen @Racheldoesstuff @katemicucci @rianjohnson Love you Al!!!'
b'@rianjohnson Such a perfect night. Back of my head is still throbbing from the pure joy that exited my body at that show. Such a legend.'
b'@thelumineers Two legends in the making. Love this.\xf0\x9f\x91\xb6\xf0\x9f\x8f\xbb'
b'@MatthewFura @GCallopi @adumbwolf Matt! What\xe2\x80\x99s good man?? Beard is coming in nicely. Well done. Cheers my friend. \xf0\x9f\xa5\x83'
b'@GCallopi @adumbwolf Greg my man! What\xe2\x80\x99s is up???\xf0\x9f\xa5\x83'
b'@adumbwolf Sup!\xf0\x9f\xa5\x83'
b'@rianjohnson @KnivesOut My god you did it again. Can\xe2\x80\x99t wait to see it my friend. Bravo.'
b'@Old_Zeddicus That was me. Loving me some Singapore.'

b'I have decided to take a break from all things social media. Keeping my head up and phone down for a little while. Need some time to focus on work and family. Can\xe2\x80\x99t thank you all enough for the love and support. Much love to you all.\xf0\x9f\x96\xa4'
